resources.string: We have found a registered event with the same event title. As such, we have implemented restrictions that the event provider has set. Please have this ready to show your event provider.

We have not found a registered event with the same event title. As such, your description of the event is the only factor for a self-check. Please note that this does not have any basis nor can be used to enter events.
Just a reminder, you have an event soon! Make sure to have your check ready and saying \"Go\"!
